summary: A creative strategist with 12 years of professional experience specializing in marketing and business development, and 6 years of education in product proposition and design solutions. Combine business strategy and product development expertise to solve industry challenges and satisfy customer demands. A self-starter who is passionate and always has the willingness to learn new things. Strong communication skills to translate complex technical language into lucid business language. Confident in structuring information and ideas, followed by convincing presentations to clients. Cross-cultural background with high adaptability and international perspective. Build trust and bring influence through empathy and respect. Under challenges and pressures, choose to keep focus and figure out solutions.
